entries.body:
## Major Release 5.0: The Harmonization Update

This is a major update focusing on consistency, customization, and advanced world-building features.

### Complete Visual Overhaul
- **Book Designer Perfected**: The new Book Designer modal is now fully feature-complete and styled to match the new standard.
  - Added time increment per scene option ([73e0cc0](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/73e0cc0f57d623e8efd686dc4a6491690b0639c1))
- **New Welcome Screen**: A redesigned welcome screen for new vaults, featuring better orientation and direct links to the Book Designer.
- **Restyled Modals**: Every single modal in the plugin has been harmonized with a consistent, polished design.
  - Creating a centralized modal style container with basic formatting for all modals ([08e252f](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/08e252f7f6e6e17b08f196c11d490a9f1872f10c))
  - Modal styles refactored ([cdd0e49](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/cdd0e49c4be43c9707e09b041d0585940af704b8))

###  Acts & Structure
- **Infinite Custom Acts**: You are no longer limited to a fixed number of acts. Create as many as you need ([ebd2da9](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/ebd2da9a06ab3758db5998178a0d54a50af9451d)).
- **Custom Labels**: Give your acts custom names directly in settings.
- **Updated Structure Modals**: All modals related to acts and structure have been updated to support the new flexible act system.

###  Enhanced Settings & Customization
- **Story Beat Editor**: Edit your Custom Story Beats directly in settings.
- **Enhanced Custom Story Beats**: Better support for defining your own beat templates with beat level naming and order editing ([ebd2da9](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/ebd2da9a06ab3758db5998178a0d54a50af9451d)).
- **Advanced YAML Editor**: A powerful new editor for your metadata templates.

###  World Building & Logic
- **Alien Calendar System**: Full support for alternative calendar systems.
  - Completed Planet Calendar system and view in Chronologue Mode ([b21e870](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/b21e87031ea519db8618a7a1071a8762a8b677c6))
  - Validation icons and Mars template included.
- **Chronologue Parallel Calendar**: Press `Alt` (or `Option`) to reveal the parallel calendar system in Chronologue mode.
- **Local LLM Support**: More options and better integration for working with local AI models.

###  Other Improvements
- **Backdrop Styling**: Updated styles for Alt and Shift backdrop interactions ([8d627a1](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/8d627a1c2f4d5950b386e7decb358a7aabbac3e0)).
- **Backdrop Time Alignment**: Now correctly aligns with corresponding scene time indexes in outer ring ([73e0cc0](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/73e0cc0f57d623e8efd686dc4a6491690b0639c1)).
- **Tooltips**: New tooltip system using Obsidian bubbles ([b21e870](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/b21e87031ea519db8618a7a1071a8762a8b677c6)).

## Major Release 5.0: The Harmonization Update

This is a major update focusing on consistency, customization, and advanced world-building features.

### Complete Visual Overhaul
- **Book Designer Perfected**: The new Book Designer modal is now fully feature-complete and styled to match the new standard.
  - Added time increment per scene option ([73e0cc0](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/73e0cc0f57d623e8efd686dc4a6491690b0639c1))
- **New Welcome Screen**: A redesigned welcome screen for new vaults, featuring better orientation and direct links to the Book Designer.
- **Restyled Modals**: Every single modal in the plugin has been harmonized with a consistent, polished design.
  - Creating a centralized modal style container with basic formatting for all modals ([08e252f](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/08e252f7f6e6e17b08f196c11d490a9f1872f10c))
  - Modal styles refactored ([cdd0e49](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/cdd0e49c4be43c9707e09b041d0585940af704b8))

###  Acts & Structure
- **Infinite Custom Acts**: You are no longer limited to a fixed number of acts. Create as many as you need ([ebd2da9](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/ebd2da9a06ab3758db5998178a0d54a50af9451d)).
- **Custom Labels**: Give your acts custom names directly in settings.
- **Updated Structure Modals**: All modals related to acts and structure have been updated to support the new flexible act system.

###  Enhanced Settings & Customization
- **Story Beat Editor**: Edit your Custom Story Beats directly in settings.
- **Enhanced Custom Story Beats**: Better support for defining your own beat templates with beat level naming and order editing ([ebd2da9](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/ebd2da9a06ab3758db5998178a0d54a50af9451d)).
- **Advanced YAML Editor**: A powerful new editor for your metadata templates.

###  World Building & Logic
- **Alien Calendar System**: Full support for alternative calendar systems.
  - Completed Planet Calendar system and view in Chronologue Mode ([b21e870](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/b21e87031ea519db8618a7a1071a8762a8b677c6))
  - Validation icons and Mars template included.
- **Chronologue Parallel Calendar**: Press `Alt` (or `Option`) to reveal the parallel calendar system in Chronologue mode.
- **Local LLM Support**: More options and better integration for working with local AI models.

###  Other Improvements
- **Backdrop Styling**: Updated styles for Alt and Shift backdrop interactions ([8d627a1](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/8d627a1c2f4d5950b386e7decb358a7aabbac3e0)).
- **Backdrop Time Alignment**: Now correctly aligns with corresponding scene time indexes in outer ring ([73e0cc0](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/73e0cc0f57d623e8efd686dc4a6491690b0639c1)).
- **Tooltips**: New tooltip system using Obsidian bubbles ([b21e870](https://github.com/EricRhysTaylor/Radial-Timeline/commit/b21e87031ea519db8618a7a1071a8762a8b677c6)).
